column4: how is it possible to specify from which repo to install ffmpeg, faac and faad... i have installed it from ubuntu edgy repo, but now want to install it from medibuntu edgy, because the ubuntu package is broken
add the medibuntu repo... if the version is higher there then apt-get update && apt-get upgrade will isntall the higher version
i added the medibuntu repo and reinstalled ffmpeg, but the version is still ***ubuntu and not medi
type apt-cache madison <<package name>> and pastebin it for me :)
the package name, not the version
(1) You have not "sudo apt-get update"'d before running the command
(2) There is no version of ffmpeg in that repository
what's the url of the repo?
there is no ffmpeg in their repository
